title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label
2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'

Actual Behavior (OB): The label height remains the same after changing the font size.

Expected Behavior (EB): The label height should adjust accordingly when the font size is modified.

Steps to Reproduce (SR): 
1. Add a label to the UI
2. Change the font size of the label to '18 points'
3. Check that the label height does not change.
